metadata.synopsis: Reactivity on the mannequins in the grotto tailor room. Used by sharrans as disguises on their missions. Also captures if Shadowheart failed her memory check.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 0. Recruit Shadowheart1. Go to the shar grotto2. Interact with the mannequins

0.speaker: Player
0.text: What are these mannequins here for?
